title: Live news: Hong Kong to ban passenger flights from US, UK and Australia
content:
1. Live news: Hong Kong to ban passenger flights from US, UK and Australia  Financial Times
  2. Omicron: Hong Kong Scraps Flights, Shuts Bars and Gyms in Covid Zero Policy  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. Hong Kong bans some inbound flights, tightens domestic COVID-19 restrictions  Arab News
  4. Hong Kong Bans Flights From U.S., U.K., Six Other Nations  Bloomberg
  5. Hong Kong leader announces new COVID measures, including flight bans  Reuters
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 现场新闻：香港将禁止美国、英国和澳大利亚的客运航班
現場新聞：香港將禁止美國、英國和澳大利亞的客運航班
ライブニュース：香港、米国・英国・豪州からの旅客便を禁止へ
